title: Unable to connect to any game. (NOT EVEN A CUSTOM, OR TO SPECTATE A FRIEND'S GAME. PLEASE HELP)
body:
I recently got a new internet service provider that works like a charm. I've updated this game on my computer, (since I took a huge break from it) and wanted to test the new connection on a custom game. When I did, the loading screen popped up and my desired champion and username didn't show up, which led to BugSplat opening up without a moments notice. I figured since it's been a while, something must've been left out while the game was patching. I've waited out the "**Repair Tool**", but the same issue still occurred. This goes on for hours. I've sent tickets, followed any troubleshooting instructions on the support site,  and nearly risked destroying a few important files on my computer, but to no avail. Despite the hardcore and toxic community, I just want to get back into it once more, just for the enjoyment. Hope someone helps.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: Those Bugsplats are the games way of letting you know that something critically failed within the game files, but the client wasn't able to figure out exactly what went wrong. Let's go over the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to make sure we cover all our bases. Hit me back up if that doesn't seem to be helping!
